title: Japan Average Monthly Wages in Manufacturing
description: Wages in Manufacturing in Japan decreased to 335072 JPY/Month in September from 340964 JPY/Month in August of 2022. Wages in Manufacturing in Japan averaged 252537.03 JPY/Month from 1951 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 868487 JPY/Month in December of 1997 and a record low of 9785 JPY/Month in March of 1951. This page provides - Japan Average Monthly Wages in Manufacturing - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare, Japan
